participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, values close relationships and personal growth.
participant_1.background: My family and I have a close bond because we've been through a lot together. I don t have a lot of friends. I learn new things to keep my mind sharp. I ve flown out of the country. I live in the suburbs so that I can be close to my family and friends, but I also enjoy visiting the city to see my best friend and play cello with her.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and determined, with a passion for nature and helping others.
participant_2.background: I hike and camp with my friends for exercise and to enjoy nature. I want to be a doctor. I am a grown woman. Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab. I have trouble getting along with family.

content.text: Doing good. Thanks for asking! How about yourself?
Doing okay, I'm a bit tired but I've been hiking a lot recently.
That sounds fun! I hike and camp with my friends for exercise and to enjoy nature.
Nice! I love camping but I don't go often enough. What's your favorite part about it?
I love the fresh air and the freedom of being outdoors. I also love being able to stargaze at night.
That sounds really nice. I love stargazing too!
Have you ever been to the Grand Canyon?
No, I've never been there but I've always wanted to go!
It's amazing! I went there last year and it was the most beautiful place I've ever seen.
I'm sure it is! I'll have to add it to my list of places to visit.
You should! It's definitely worth it.
